languages.text: "Вера ведет тебя по твоей нити, как меня — по моей. Мы обе служим Ему. Почему же в твоем взгляде, обращенном ко мне, столько беспокойства, Амик'Арджента?"
"Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"
languages.original_text: "Вера ведет тебя по твоей нити, как меня — по моей. Мы обе служим Ему. Почему же в твоем взгляде, обращенном ко мне, столько беспокойства, Амик'Арджента?"

traits.locale_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him. Then why is there so much worry in your eyes when you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"
"Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him. Then why is there so much worry in your eyes when you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"
"Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

"Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"
"Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

languages.text: "Der Glaube führt Euch Euren Faden entlang wie mich den meinen. Wir beide dienen dem Imperator auf unsere Weise. Warum also sehe ich in Euren Augen solche Sorge, wenn Ihr mich anseht, Amic'Argenta?"
languages.original_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Glaube führt Euch Euren Faden entlang wie mich den meinen. Wir beide dienen dem Imperator auf unsere Weise. Warum also sehe ich in Euren Augen solche Sorge, wenn Ihr mich anseht, Amic'Argenta?"

languages.text: « La foi vous guide le long de son fil comme elle me guide le long du mien. Nous Le servons toutes les deux, chacune à notre manière. Alors, dites-moi, pourquoi me regardez-vous avec tant de crainte, Amic'Argenta ? »
languages.original_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

traits.locale_text: « La foi vous guide le long de son fil comme elle me guide le long du mien. Nous Le servons toutes les deux, chacune à notre manière. Alors, dites-moi, pourquoi me regardez-vous avec tant de crainte, Amic'Argenta ? »

languages.text: «La fe la guía por su hilo como a mí por el mío. Ambas servimos al Inmortal a nuestra manera. Entonces, ¿por qué me mira con esa preocupación, Amic'Argenta?».
languages.original_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

traits.locale_text: «La fe la guía por su hilo como a mí por el mío. Ambas servimos al Inmortal a nuestra manera. Entonces, ¿por qué me mira con esa preocupación, Amic'Argenta?».

languages.text: 「信仰は、私を私の糸に沿って導くように、あなたの糸に沿ってあなたを導く。私たちは二人とも、それぞれのやり方で主に仕えている。それなのに、アルジェンタ、私を見るたびに、あなたの目が心配そうなのはなぜ？」
languages.original_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

traits.locale_text: 「信仰は、私を私の糸に沿って導くように、あなたの糸に沿ってあなたを導く。私たちは二人とも、それぞれのやり方で主に仕えている。それなのに、アルジェンタ、私を見るたびに、あなたの目が心配そうなのはなぜ？」

languages.text: “信仰指引着你的道路，也同样指引着我的道路，我们都以各自的方式来服侍祂。既然如此，为什么你每次看着我的时候，我都能从你的眼神中看到担忧呢，信者阿洁塔？”
languages.original_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

traits.locale_text: “信仰指引着你的道路，也同样指引着我的道路，我们都以各自的方式来服侍祂。既然如此，为什么你每次看着我的时候，我都能从你的眼神中看到担忧呢，信者阿洁塔？”

languages.original_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"

languages.text: "İnanç, tıpkı bana olduğu gibi sana da ipliğinde kılavuzluk ediyor. İkimiz de O'na kendi yöntemlerimizle hizmet ediyoruz. Peki neden bana her baktığında gözlerinde böylesine bir endişe görüyorum Amik'Argenta?"
languages.original_text: "Faith leads you along your thread as it leads me along mine. We both serve Him in our own way. So, why do I see such worry in your eyes whenever you look at me, Amic'Argenta?"
